entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Survey: GitHub contributor experience for dotnet/efcore #27348
    Discussions
  • Nullable String with Unique Index Converted to Empty String #27347
  • Default value "HasDefaultValueSql" not working as expected. #27346
  • ArgumentException thrown When GroupJoin is applied on a DbSet as a first join and NOT when applied as a second or later #27343
  • Validate that GetContainingPropertyName() is null iff IsDocumentRoot() #27342
  • Better handling of default value in inherited Base entity in DbContext #27341
  • Allow value generation on some composite FK properties #27340

Closed

  • Redundant queries when using OUTER APPLY #27349
  • Why do IQueryables produced by methods other than OrderBy(Descending) satisfy the `is IOrderedQueryable` condition? #27330
  • Support IMutableNavigation.SetJsonPropertyName/IReadOnlyNavigation.GetJsonPropertyName - CosmosDB Provider #27328
  • I am not sure the problem comes from efcore or .net sdk #27311
  • Setting a Nullable Foreign Key property to Null triggers cascade delete #27174
    6.0.3
  • EF Core adds an Id column for foreign key relation although foreign key is provided explicitely #27315

PullRequests

Created

  • Issue 27301 - Optimizer hangs on properties implementing a referential collection #27350
  • Cosmos: Add IS_DEFINED() function to cosmos provider #27344

Merged

  • Remove quirks. #27345
  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27072 - Suboptimal SQL generation for query with optional navigation, its collection navigation and lateral join #27302
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Query: Convert single result subquery comparison to null to Any operation #27284
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] RevEng: Don't use nameof syntax (#26622) #27231
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Store ApplicationServiceProvider in a WeakReference #27190
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27338
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27337
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27336
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Revert change to delete dependent when optional FK with cascade delete is set to null #27216
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Match correct predicate structure to convert apply to join #27292
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
